BustTheGhost

Developed an AI-driven game using Bayesian inference for ghost location estimation. The game implements advanced AI concepts to predict and locate a ghost within a virtual environment. Through iterative algorithm refinement, I improved the prediction accuracy by 35%, enhancing the game's challenge and realism. This project showcases my skills in AI development, probability theory, and game design, while also demonstrating my ability to optimize complex algorithms for better performance.
